fields.name: Polar Mobile
fields.blurb: Polar Mobile is a global leader in helping media companies distribute and monetize content on mobile devices. Their vision is to enable the next-generation media experience by making mobile fast, easy and effective.

fields.name: Voice On The Go
fields.blurb: Voice On The Go is a privately held corporation that was founded in 2005 and is currently a leader in speech-to-text and text-to-speech technologies, particularly in the mobile application space.
